3FBA96C2.Line5.101BAB: Wait 'til you've burned as many as I have... just about every last soul you've known...

8EB3433E.Line1.101BAB: Not the (hic) most pleasant work, eh?

8FF0C28F.VoiceDir5.101BAB: Regular volume for the first half, in a mock-joking/proud tone. Then a bit quieter and more somber, in the second half. He's trying to cover up his pain and isn't totally succeeding.
